segment.source: Introduces accessibility concepts that relate to Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.
segment.target: Introduces accessibility concepts that relate to Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.

segment.source: Accessibility
segment.target: Accessibility

segment.source: Accessibility
segment.target: Accessibility

segment.source: Introduces accessibility concepts that relate to Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.
segment.target: Introduces accessibility concepts that relate to Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.

segment.source: Accessibility is about building experiences that make your application available to people who use technology in a wide range of environments and approach your user interface with a range of needs and experiences.
segment.target: Accessibility is about building experiences that make your application available to people who use technology in a wide range of environments and approach your user interface with a range of needs and experiences.

segment.source: For some situations, accessibility requirements are imposed by law.
segment.target: For some situations, accessibility requirements are imposed by law.

segment.source: However, it's a good idea to address accessibility issues regardless of legal requirements so that your apps have the largest possible audience.
segment.target: However, it's a good idea to address accessibility issues regardless of legal requirements so that your apps have the largest possible audience.

segment.source: There's also a Windows Store declaration regarding accessibility for your app.
segment.target: There's also a Windows Store declaration regarding accessibility for your app.

segment.source: Declaring the app as accessible is only relevant to the Windows Store.
segment.target: Declaring the app as accessible is only relevant to the Windows Store.

segment.source: Article
segment.target: Article

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Accessibility overview
segment.target: Accessibility overview

segment.source: This article is an overview of the concepts and technologies related to accessibility scenarios for UWP apps.
segment.target: This article is an overview of the concepts and technologies related to accessibility scenarios for UWP apps.

segment.source: Designing inclusive software
segment.target: Designing inclusive software

segment.source: Learn about evolving inclusive design with Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps for Windows 10.
segment.target: Learn about evolving inclusive design with Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps for Windows 10.

segment.source: Design and build inclusive software with accessibility in mind.
segment.target: Design and build inclusive software with accessibility in mind.

segment.source: Developing inclusive Windows apps
segment.target: Developing inclusive Windows apps

segment.source: This article is a roadmap for developing accessible UWP apps.
segment.target: This article is a roadmap for developing accessible UWP apps.

segment.source: Accessibility testing
segment.target: Accessibility testing

segment.source: Testing procedures to follow to ensure that your UWP app is accessible.
segment.target: Testing procedures to follow to ensure that your UWP app is accessible.

segment.source: Accessibility in the Store
segment.target: Accessibility in the Store

segment.source: Describes the requirements for declaring your UWP app as accessible in the Windows Store.
segment.target: Describes the requirements for declaring your UWP app as accessible in the Windows Store.

segment.source: Accessibility checklist
segment.target: Accessibility checklist

segment.source: Provides a checklist to help you ensure that your UWP app is accessible.
segment.target: Provides a checklist to help you ensure that your UWP app is accessible.

segment.source: Expose basic accessibility information
segment.target: Expose basic accessibility information

segment.source: Basic accessibility info is often categorized into name, role, and value.
segment.target: Basic accessibility info is often categorized into name, role, and value.

segment.source: This topic describes code to help your app expose the basic information that assistive technologies need.
segment.target: This topic describes code to help your app expose the basic information that assistive technologies need.

segment.source: Keyboard accessibility
segment.target: Keyboard accessibility

segment.source: If your app does not provide good keyboard access, users who are blind or have mobility issues can have difficulty using your app or may not be able to use it at all.
segment.target: If your app does not provide good keyboard access, users who are blind or have mobility issues can have difficulty using your app or may not be able to use it at all.

segment.source: High-contrast themes
segment.target: High-contrast themes

segment.source: Describes the steps needed to ensure your UWP app is usable when a high-contrast theme is active.
segment.target: Describes the steps needed to ensure your UWP app is usable when a high-contrast theme is active.

segment.source: Accessible text requirements
segment.target: Accessible text requirements

segment.source: This topic describes best practices for accessibility of text in an app, by assuring that colors and backgrounds satisfy the necessary contrast ratio.
segment.target: This topic describes best practices for accessibility of text in an app, by assuring that colors and backgrounds satisfy the necessary contrast ratio.

segment.source: This topic also discusses the Microsoft UI Automation roles that text elements in a UWP app can have, and best practices for text in graphics.
segment.target: This topic also discusses the Microsoft UI Automation roles that text elements in a UWP app can have, and best practices for text in graphics.

segment.source: Accessibility practices to avoid
segment.target: Accessibility practices to avoid

segment.source: Lists the practices to avoid if you want to create an accessible UWP app.
segment.target: Lists the practices to avoid if you want to create an accessible UWP app.

segment.source: Custom automation peers
segment.target: Custom automation peers

segment.source: Describes the concept of automation peers for UI Automation, and how you can provide automation support for your own custom UI class.
segment.target: Describes the concept of automation peers for UI Automation, and how you can provide automation support for your own custom UI class.

segment.source: Control patterns and interfaces
segment.target: Control patterns and interfaces

segment.source: Lists the Microsoft UI Automation control patterns, the classes that clients use to access them, and the interfaces providers use to implement them.
segment.target: Lists the Microsoft UI Automation control patterns, the classes that clients use to access them, and the interfaces providers use to implement them.

segment.target: Related topics
